text:
──This time, we're planning to make new costumes for the next live.
The design sketches have arrived, so please take a look, Mano.

...We can still discuss the design,
so feel free to mention any concerns you have.

...Um, just a bit... When I imagine wearing this,
I feel like I could become like a bird too...

Thinking that way, my heart tightens,
and I can't look away...

Haha, I see. Yeah, there are definitely
feather-like motifs around the waist.

...Yes ...I'm looking forward to being able
to wear the costumes from now on...
